  • Classes in org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor used by org.svvrl.goal.gui 
    Class and Description
    AutomatonCanvas
    An AutomatonCanvas is a panel containing an automaton drawer and automaton tools that can draw something.
    AutomatonEditor
    An AutomatonEditor is an editor for automata.
    Editor
    An Editor is a panel that can display an editable object and perform some editing.
    InputSimulatorViewer
    This class provides methods for the visualization of an input simulator.
    RunDagViewer
    This class provides methods to visualize a run dag.
    RunTreeViewer
    This class provides methods to visualize a run tree.
    SplitTreeViewer
    This class provides methods to visualize a split tree.

  • Classes in org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor used by org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor 
    Class and Description
    AbstractAccEditor
    An AbstractAccEditor is an editor for editing an acceptance condition.
    AbstractNBWLikeAccEditor
    This is a property editor for editing NBW-like acceptance conditions.
    AbstractNGBWLikeAccEditor
    This is an editor for editing NGBW-like acceptance conditions.
    AbstractNRWLikeAccEditor
    This is an editor for editing NRW-like acceptance conditions.
    AbstractNTBWLikeAccEditor
    This is a property editor for editing NTBW-like acceptance conditions.
    AbstractNTGBWLikeAccEditor
    This is a property editor for editing NTGBW-like acceptance conditions.
    AbstractNTRWLikeAccEditor
    This is a property editor for editing NTRW-like acceptance conditions.
    AccDialog
    An AccDialog is a dialog containing an editor suitable for editing the acceptance condition of the active automaton in a specific GOAL window.
    AccSelectionListener
    An AccSelectionListener is a listener that is interested in the selection of acceptance sets (or pairs) in an AccDialog.
    AltTransitionPropertyEditor
    An AltTransitionPropertyEditor editor is a property editor for alternating transitions.
    AutomatonCanvas
    An AutomatonCanvas is a panel containing an automaton drawer and automaton tools that can draw something.
    AutomatonEditor
    An AutomatonEditor is an editor for automata.
    AutomatonPropertyEditor
    This is a property editor for automata.
    EditablePropertyEditor
    This is a property editor for editable objects.
    Editor
    An Editor is a panel that can display an editable object and perform some editing.
    FormulaEditor
    A FormulaEditor is an editor for logic formulae.
    GraphicComponentPropertyEditor
    A GraphicComponentPropertyEditor is a property editor for graphic components such as states and transitions.
    GraphicComponentSetListModel
    A GraphicComponentSetListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of graphic components.
    PropertyDialog
    A PropertyDialog is a dialog that contains a property editor for some object.
    PropertyEditor
    A PropertyEditor is a panel used to edit properties of some object.
    ScrollablePanel
    This class provides a panel that is aware of the movement on a Mac trackpad.
    StatePropertyEditor
    A StatePropertyEditor editor is a property editor for states.
